Package orinoco

Interface Summary
LayoutWriter An interface containing the various methods enabling client applications to invoke operations which layout text
OutputFormatWriter Empty interface used for typing purposes
Table A table.
TextMacro The interface to be implemented by text macros
TextWriter The basic interface for writing text to a document
 

Class Summary
Alignment Enumeration type specifying the various types of text alignment
Colour Enumeration class listing the types of colour
Column Defines the layout of a column within a table
Document The main API interface for the laying out and formatting of data Note that this is object requires two phase construction.
Font An enumeration containing the available fonts
Heading A column heading for a table.
PageNumber A macro used to include the page number.
Paper An enumeration type containing the available paper dimension.
PDFWriter Outputs the requested data in postscript format
PostscriptWriter Outputs the requested data in postscript format
 

Exception Summary
OrinocoIOException An extension of java.io.IOException containing Orinoco specific exceptions
